title: Microsoft unveils free EU cybersecurity program for governments
summary: Microsoft announced in Berlin today a new European Security Program that promises to bolster cybersecurity for European governments. [...]

title: FBI: Play ransomware breached 900 victims, including critical orgs
summary: In an update to a joint advisory with CISA and the Australian Cyber Security Centre, the FBI said that the Play ransomware gang had breached roughly 900 organizations as of May 2025, three times the number of victims reported in October 2023. [...]

title: Hacker arrested for breaching 5,000 hosting accounts to mine crypto
summary: The Ukrainian police arrested a 35-year-old hacker who breached 5,000 accounts at an international hosting company and used them to mine cryptocurrency, resulting in $4.5 million in damages. [...]

title: Cisco warns of ISE and CCP flaws with public exploit code
summary: Cisco has released patches to address three vulnerabilities with public exploit code in its Identity Services Engine (ISE) and Customer Collaboration Platform (CCP) solutions. [...]

title: Ukraine claims it hacked Tupolev, Russia’s strategic warplane maker
summary: The Main Intelligence Directorate (GUR) of Ukraine's Ministry of Defense claims it hacked the Russian aerospace and defense company Tupolev, which develops Russia's supersonic strategic bombers. [...]
